info.author: Evolio.ca, Auto123.com, Xprima.com
classifiers: Topic :: Internet :: WWW/HTTP :: Site Management :: Link Checking
info.description:
pylinkchecker is a simple crawler that traverses a web sites and reports errors
(e.g., 500 and 404 errors) encountered. The crawler can try to download
resources like images.
info.name: pylinkchecker
info.summary: Simple crawler that detects link errors such as 404 and 500.
info.html_description: pylinkchecker is a simple crawler that traverses a web sites and reports errors (e.g., 500 and 404 errors) encountered. The crawler can try to download resources like images.
